command.name: ncbi-blastp-plus-restrict
command.arg: -query $;I_FILE_PATH$; -db $;DATABASE_PATH$; -evalue $;EXPECT$; -word_size $;WORDSIZE$; -max_target_seqs $;MAX_TARGET_SEQS$; -outfmt "6 qseqid qlen sseqid qstart qend sstart send pident ppos score bitscore salltitles frames sstrand slen evalue" -out $;OUTPUT_DIRECTORY$;/$;ITERATOR_NAME$;/g$;GROUP_NUMBER$;/$;I_FILE_BASE$;.$;COMPONENT_NAME$;.btab -num_threads $;NUM_THREADS$; -dbsize $;DBSIZE$; -seqidlist $;RESTRICTION_PATH$;
